Reviews.Title: “First time to Paris...good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Leahgradpa
Reviews.Content: boyfriend paris beginning march 2012 stayed hotel de notre dame hotel super close notre dame located paris tons cafes hotel stones throw metro station taxi stand booked thru hotelscom please size supplied pillows comforters meaning alot day sightseeing aspect stay hotel size bathroom ive europe am aware normally scale toilet crazy definitely deal price staff ok free wifi stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Clodagh M
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel de notre dame 2 nights february 2012 relied heavily reviews tripadvisor recommend read 5th arondissement stay focused hotels lovely 3 star boutique style hotel quiet street minutes notre dame dont shocked 50 bigger ones requested top floor views cathedral 3 star perfectly clean functional comfortable nice bed safe hairdryer tv etc hotel base paris arent deal 3 star dont expect ritz location perfect close plenty little restaurants bars metro hop hop stops minutes walk criticism guests stayed previously obviously smoking left window sightseeing fine definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great location, lovey hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Edel M
Reviews.Content: booked birthday definitely recommend hotel reasons firstly hotel located quiet sidestreet approx 3 minutes walk notre dame staff friendly hotel comfortable lobby finished standard definitely stay ate restaurant le short distance hotel recommend fresh home cooked food service prices reasonable €30 courses definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: MrMarkus1967
Reviews.Content: stayed nice calm stay quiet picturesque sidestreet river road notre dame 3 minute walk bridge didnt eat wasnt deal cafes bars pricey aimed tourists locals quick cheap bite local supermarkets bought delicious bread cheese ham sandwiches morning hotel isnt flashy quietly elegant lobby internet access nice chairs sit plan day top hike carrying bags nice medium sized attic wooden beams windows onto little courtyards wasnt huge comfortable dont complaints perfect base short trip

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and exceptional location and staff for over 20 years”
Reviews.Author: Kate M
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 20 exceptional owner staff hotel excellent location walking metro stayed children returned own weekend lobby refurnished 2010 excellent condition yes smallonly compared american standards adequate hopefully enjoying paris location paris clean comfortable safe

Reviews.Title: “Great location, reasonable price, cozy bedroom”
Reviews.Author: Ana D
Reviews.Content: friend mine stay hotel quartier latin found hotel internet decided book price cheaper hotels neighbourhood hotel definetely pick 2 brazilian women concerned getting late hotel location safe 1 block seine river close tourist attractions restaurants subway stations gone walking breakfast included daily rate worth reception nicely decorated computer free building brand ok isnt brand building paris bedroom clean cozy air conditioning fine windows totally fresh air bathroom furniture wardrobe size space leave baggage floor tv lights inside bedroom french people friendly 100 hotel employees half nice recommend hotel de notre dame

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Travel_King058
Reviews.Content: pros location located 5 minutes san michel train location local train stations super convenient rer airport san michel station lot restuarants bars touristy hotel clean bathroom modern hotel staff helpful speaks english cons hotel dont plan besides sleeping heard paris hotels bathroom door hook bathroom bath towels easy fix hotel free wifi signal weak probably ok lobby location clean makes option

Reviews.Title: “Great location, fantastic host”
Reviews.Author: Fox1987
Reviews.Content: pleased night stay notre dame hotel owner ensure pleasant stay decor reception bright modern able luggage store checked 7pm allowed explore city heavy suitcase hotel tucked homely feel expected location paris modern equipped lots restaurants cafes walking distance pantheon batobus river cruise metro 5 minute overall stay try 4th 5th floor view

Reviews.Title: “Mixed bag”
Reviews.Author: DH76
Reviews.Content: probably written positive review hotel apologised building arrived expecting advance warning probably breakfast available request suggestions met gallic shrug beaucoup de cafes poor impressions aside location e100 unreasonable value paris coathangers quirky decor floor anyway shower bathroom size phone box comfortable bed real pillows 2 ft clearance bed

Reviews.Title: “charming and perfectly situated”
Reviews.Author: MairiA
Reviews.Content: stayed week 12 daughter visit paris hotel close metro rer charles de gaulle airport disney line stations quiet pleasant street 2 minutes walk river notre dame lots restaurants cafes shops surrounding streets close batobus stops sightseeing top bus tour lovely hotel pleasant staff beautiful breakfast delicious fresh bread croissants pleasant public seating lobby bedroom expect paris decorated chic shower top floor real view issue bed little firm thats picky cheap thats paris happy pay little nice hotel especially travelling child little wary due couple reviews tripadvisor cant imagine major hotel loved daughter wouldnt hesitate

Reviews.Title: ““Great location, beaucoup charm, very romantic.””
Reviews.Author: Ami_and_Jeff
Reviews.Content: date review 15 2009 56 fourth floor half flight half flight spiral staircase tower facing courtyard sounds pain actually romantic charming ceiling vaulted exposed beams nine yards french bathroom marble floor tub shower shower curtain hold shower nozzle fun mornings minifridge plumbing totally modern breakfast service fantastic bread pastries delicious coffee hot chocolate wifes heart melt location absolutely perfect 5 minute walk notre dame 2 minute walk pastry shop metro saturday 5th arrondissement farmers market corner unbelievable

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS PLACE ....”
Reviews.Author: JTManchester
Reviews.Content: chic hotel amazing paris latin quarter stylishly furnished bathrooms lovely spa bath glows colours rest hotel nicely furnished staff absolutely brilliant hotel literally minutes main road notre dame metro rer station lovely restaurants bars bistros quirky little designer shops daughter 21st birthday absolutely thrilled definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “loved it and will definetly go back!”
Reviews.Author: piggybag
Reviews.Content: little gem location latin quarter quiet street lots eat drink neighbourhood romance trip love nice clean bit doesnt matter deco nice cosy bathrooms remember waht looks webpage specify book service reception english speaking walking distance paris marais quater bastille luxemborg garden sorbonne notre dame les halles hotel de ville looking forward

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: mlaschenski
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel elegant quiet attic particularly considering excellent location centre capital city plenty space comfortable bed modern look staff friendly answered emails beforehand promptly metro stop corner booked via eurostar website deal 100 gbp night breakfast plenty cafes nearby cheap definitely stay similar deal hotel location worth

Reviews.Title: “If you have children, forget it”
Reviews.Author: Sullivac
Reviews.Content: nice hotel booked via hotel booking site told brusquely arrived extra child incredible 200 euros wasnt expecting wifi flaky useful using laptop technical stuff living wifi flaky im tested hotel staff listened tried help wouldnt writing review guy desk friendly helpful pretty suggested hear youve travelled day sorry wont using hotel poor bad experience trip run online business customer service time doing stuff children helpful friendly polite french comedy sketch

Reviews.Title: “Smart small hotel in a fantastic location!”
Reviews.Author: DiLoa
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights found excellent terms location bars restaurants short distance metro hotel upgrading looked upgrade bit standard clean real novelty bath lit sink bedroom recommend hotel quiet night didnt undisturbed sleep didnt eat breakfast hotel 11 euros bit expensive actually definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Even better”
Reviews.Author: Coppins
Reviews.Content: hi husband stayed hotel de notre dame weekend stayed times discovered hotel 16 ago reception helpful receptionists havent changed thats hotel refurbed earlier bathrooms improvement location fab hotel secondary baths shower curtain help flood floor time showered couldnt disperse water walk power shower aircon wonderful weekend unbearably hot paris downside putting aircon vents run straight hear word gentlemen door price pay cool spent weekend paris prices astronomical £450 diet coke £1 public toilets funny super hotel ideal location highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great Find - highly recommend the hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: GoVTHokieTraveler
Reviews.Content: found hotel perfect price staff friendly helpful ac lucky weather hot hotel little narrow quaint street view notre dame awoke bells clean bed comfortable satellite tv allowed english speaking channels nice watch news morning plus hotel convenient electrical outlets free wifi close block quai de catch 24 bus lourve musee dorsay eiffel tower etc bus convenient faster subway walk notre dame batobus subway 2 blocks maubert stop eat le 3 rue des corner hotel ice cream berthillon 31

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel de Notre Dame "Maitre Albert"
HotelInfo.Address: 19 Rue Maitre Albert, 75005 Paris, France
